Fig. 11. The projection of two healthy and two myopathic LV motions (each containing 8 motion snapshots) onto the 2D plane illustrates that the points corresponding to the healthy LV are scattered all over the 2D plane, but those of the myopathic LV are concentrated on the same part of the 2D plane.
